title: Lenovo Tab 4 8 Plus 3 GB RAM 16 GB ROM 8 inch with Wi-Fi+4G Tablet (Aurora Black)

product_specification.Operating Frequency: GSM: B2/B3/B5/B8, UMTS: B1/B2/B5/B8, 4G FDD LTE: B1/B2/B3/B4/B5/B7/B8/B20, 4G TDD LTE: B38/B40
product_specification.Additional Features: Microsoft Powerpoint, Microsoft Word, dual glass casings for the front and back, Lenovo Account, OneDrive Microsoft, Skype, OneNote Microsoft, Lenovo Framework, Lenovo SYNCit, Microsoft Outlook, Dolby Atmos Sound, Lenovo Applications: Lenovo SHAREit, Lenovo User Experience (UE), Microsoft Excel, 2 x Front Facing Speakers, Netflix, Third Party Applications: Google Calendar
product_specification.Sales Package: Tablet, Charger, USB Cable, Quick Start Guide, Warranty Card
product_specification.Sensors: G-Sensor, P-Sensor, L-Sensor, Vibrator, Hall Sensor, Fingerprint
product_specification.Internet Browsing Time: WiFi: Over 8 Hours, 3G: Over 8 Hours, LTE: Over 8 Hours
product_specification.Other Camera Features: Auto Focus Rear Camera, Fixed Focus Front Camera
product_specification.Other Display Features: 60% Color Gamut, 390 nits Brightness, 10 Point Multi-touch Display
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Tablet, 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.Full HD Display for Captivating Visuals: From Netflix to video games, enjoy a wide-angle viewing experience on the 20.32 cm (8) FHD display.
product_description.High-quality Audio: Enjoy your favourite tracks to the fullest, with or without headphones, thanks to the Dolby Atmos technology.
product_description.Sleek and Lightweight: With 7 mm thickness and weighing only 310 grams, it is easy to carry around by anyone.
product_description.Performance That Commands Respect: A Qualcomm Snapdragon 64-bit quad-core processor, 3 GB of RAM and 16 GB of internal memory make for a seamless and fast user experience.
product_description.One Tablet, Multiple Accounts: Each member of the family can have their own account with individual passwords, settings and social media accounts, all on one tablet.

review:
After using for 2 months
First of all the main difference between tab 4 8 plus and tab 4 8 is hd display and ram variant and 8 plus is 20 gm lighter than tab 4 8
Excellent product no lag found till now
1(a).crisp clear hd display,its a treat to watch or operate anything whether watching movies or playing games
1(b).easy to hold ,easy to operate the tablet as it's weighs only 300 gms ,it doesn't feel a heavy tablet,its like a big phone
1(c).Where is quick charge
it takes a long time to charge compare to normal usb,but battery still longs till 2 days

2.Decent camera
U can't expect a good camera from a tablet still does decent job
3.no volte support ,it will do work from jio voice app
4.excellent performance whether it's a gaming or any office work ,this is the usp of this product
5. Hybrid sim slot
5.(a) awesome sound ,u can customize the sound as desire.,there is a separate app for sound.
Overall deserves 4.5 star
U can't find the better product in this range in comparison to tablet
6.It's a long time when great android tablet comes since 2015
7.Interesting ,no indian review found of the product on YouTube neither by geekyranjit or technical sharma
8.scrolling(up to down ,down to up ,it's like circle button of mouse)problem solved:::under developer option ,search for drawing option then turn off window, animation,transition scales , scrolling will work smooth as butter or either you just root your device and change the value on build .prop (scrolling section) ,just reboot and see the magic

First impression of lenovo tab 4 8 plus. I was little bit of disappointed after seeing the specification where it is written no voice call and only 16 gb ROM. As I was waiting for this tab since the announcement made in feb'17. During BBD all another version launched but this one is not. Now my wait is over and I received the tab within 2 days of order.

Design- Galssy and classy just similar to Sony Xperia z5. Top notch design looks like premium one.
Display- Very Good but not great when compared with Sony Xperia display which I have. Full HD with somewhat less vibrant in color reproduction. Perfect size 8" for better viewing.
Camera-Average, no complain as not very much necessary.
Processor/RAM/ROM- Faster processing, 1.3gb RAM & 8gb ROM available for user.
Speaker- Loud and clear.
Calling & Internet - yes it supports voice call in factory installed version. Don't know about future updates. Internet surfing is fast and it depends on carrier.

I compare this tab with Sony Xperia mobile as I am big fan of Sony and currently using Xperia mobile. This is my second lenovo tab and it worth to have one at this price.

Looks beautiful! Sound is beautiful, with the Dolby Atmos.. Feels a li'l slipperry due to the glass back(and no cases available yet!!). Performance is neat i thought. Fast. 3gb seems to be enough although I've not tried playing games.. But there's barely any Memory left for our use as about 7gb is used up in the OS.. The reason i waited and bought this one was the display - 283ppi. Especially since I'm planning to use it as a reading tool as well. Overall happy after 2 days of use!

a good tab right now in the market ... in this price. range
but there is one major issue is internal storage the storage is just 16 gb its very low for gamers like me . and battery is not so good ...
otherwise its great choice 👌

Ok, so I ordered Alcatel A3 tab after reading good reviews, however, I was not sure of Mediatek processor performance. Hence ordered Tab 4 8 plus

Coming to Tab 4 8plus if you in Maharashtra it will be delivered to you in 1 day. Here is my experience after using it for 2 days

Pros:

Good Built Quality and looks good, glass back, pretty light weight

Amazing speakers, dual front firing with Dolby Atmos, excellent via headphone jack as well.

Good battery life and performance, Snapdragon 625 never disappoints. Could play high end games without device heating up.

Fingerprint sensor works fine

Good touch, viewing angles as it is IPS full HD display

Nougat 7.1, got 1 gb update already

Good split screen window

Led notification light

Expandable MMC upto 128gb, Hybrid slot

Jio internet will support but not sure of VOLTE as haven't inserted the sim yet.

CONS:

Fingerprint magnet, its black glass attracts a lot of finger print at back

Charger is 5.2v 2amp, not fast not slow, it's decent. I would say it is nit picking and will not bother you as battery last long

Biggest con is 16gb Inbuilt spave out of which 7.5 or 8 gb is used by system. However you can add a micro sd card.

Scrolling issue, I am not sure if this is a bug or something to go with integration of Apps, scrolling is not that smooth inside some apps, don't get me wrong here, there is no lag but the scrolling needs to be pushed a little which is not that fluid, I am sure it can be fixed via a update. However you will not notice any lag in the laucher or while opening apps. It is just some apps.

To end the review here, If you have budget of 15k plus go for this tab it will not dissapoint you. No device is perfect

Try Nova laucher and Computer Laucher

First of all thanks to FLIPKART for your quick delivery in 24 hours without extra cost. Wel done and keep it up.

Product: Lenovo TAB 4 8 Plus
Type: LTE Call 3GB+16GB
Model: Lenovo TB-8704X

Order date: 10.10.2017, 09:30 Hrs.
Delivery date: 11.10.2017, 09:35 Hrs.

Very Good Product.

Don't compare this product with any other tablet in this price range. Nice looking. I liked it's richness.

This is a calling tablet. Can't understand why Flipkart's specification say NO VOICE CALL. Questions / clarifications before placing the order not supported by Flipkart site. Just I taken a chance at my risk.

It is a DUAL NANO SIM (hybrid) tablet. Lenovo would have made it as dedicated SIM Slot.

16 GB builtin may be insufficient. System consumes lots of space (about 9 GB) when I got in my hand. I couldn't get 64 GB version because of the verdict, Lenovo is not releasing 64 GB version. Anyhow 128 GB external storage may compensate the lacking.

Latest Android 7.1.1 is very much appreciated with full of feature.

I Feel, Protective sleve or case is must to handle this tablet because of the glass finish at back. It may slip from the hand while using. But good finishing.

Flipkart / Lenovo would have provided Exchange Option ???

Recommending for safe and good packing from the seller, i.e., M/s. Health and Happiness Pvt. Ltd.,. I appreciate your commitment in delivering the product in time as assured above.

Delivery person is very obedient. Good guy.

As a LENOVO fan since from a decade, once again I am satisfied with this product (this is my 14th Lenovo product) in my kitty.

All the best and Diwali Wishes to:
M/s. Lenovo (India) Pvt. Ltd., and Team.
M/s. Flipkart and Team.
M/s. Health and Happiness Pvt. Ltd., and Team

Got it with 10% cashback with Axis bank card and also rs. 200 instant cashback.
Writing this review after almost 20 days of usage:
At the price of 16K its a really good tablet. I wanted a tab with qualcomm snapdragon processor and with more than 2gig RAM. Found this tab to fulfil my required specs. This is a 3GB RAM + 16GB internal memory version comes with Android 7.1.1 out of the box plus few updated that were downloaded later. Works very smooth. One feature i like most is for few apps you can share screen and run two simultaneously. Even in that mode no lag is observed.
Main purpose of my usage goes into lot of browsing along with whatsapp and youtube plus online video lecture streaming. I observed that it streams HD 1080 videos without any lags and no hangs or lags eveb after app streaming videos is closed. I have used Samsung Tab2 GT P3100 for around 4 and half years and brought this tab when my previous tab entered the restart loop with no effect of factory reset also.
I can say its a definitely go for tab for this budget. Sound is good and sufficient. Display is superb. Volume and power button appears to be sturdy when pressed. Power button has a fingerprint sensor and it works great and fast. Weight is less, slim design and feel is premium although the glass back and screen surface attract fingerprint a lot. But design is simple and superb. Notification light is helpful. I found screen brightness to be sufficient and i can say its more tgan sufficient. Display clarity and color is great. Both camera are good and suffice the purpose. I havent tried low light photography yet and not used the flash too. Camera software does not have much settings available.
Of 16GB internal memory more than half is resreved by system which is quite high. But expandable memory via microSD card is present so no issue.
One thing i felt is that it slips off easily if kept on uneven surface.so you need to be carefull if it is kept on lap while sitting or so. Also no cover is available. But thats not an issue for me.
Every time i use it i found it value for money and feel to have made correct decision in selecting this tab.
I definitely recommend this tab for budget of 16k.
And as always flipkart service was up to mark with timely delivery and great price.

Good tab for price . Not a big fan of camera on tabs and mobile's . Can take decent photo . Space is an issue as it gets clogged fast in spite of putting extra SD card which the tab takes up and cannot be used elsewhere . Performance issues not much as I am only a light user of it . Me and kids using it with seperate user interface which is very nice . Inspite of multiple users it responds well . The finger sensor on the main On Off button is also cool as it changes the user also automatically .
This tab is just amazing in very good price screen quality is good camera also good and smooth in use

Writing this review after using two months. I don't like the display at all, compared to my mobile (letv le 1s) it's so dull, And it also crash every now and then. Most of the play store's apps are not compatible with this tab (may be bcz of larger display but I installed them Anyways), the few things I liked about this tab is sound , USB type c and built quality. Battery is average 4-5 screen on time

Great tab at great price
Display - good contrast , good viewing angle, viberent and sharp
Processor - SNP 625, proved performer
Ram - 1.3GB available after installing 30+ apps
Audio - One of the best
Built - Premium
Updates - believe it will get timely updates as it's mostly stock . And believe lineage OS will be out very soon to root it and get best out of it.
Overall very good tab
Only concern is only 7GB of inbuilt free storage, could have been better.

Voice call :
Yes, provided as an default calling app for other sim.
However, tab is 4G LTE; no Volte, so if you want to use Jio sim you can use Jio voice call app and make calls very easily. I am using it.
Battery:
Quite good charging time is ok and long lasting.
USB :
USB C type is provided which is not common with other android mobiles so you will face the problem in connecting it with other chargers.
The touch is good enough.
A 8" classy rich look tab stand on edge through its competitor.
Both the Cameras are very good..
Very fast in processing as installing and uninstalling an app will hardly a matter of eye blink.
No heating problem as far I have used.
For readers:
Colour inversion is provided. However I am using blue light filter app which will make your screen warm in colour (f.lux for desktop).
Finger sensor detects quite well.
Speakers are more than awesome.
For earphone user, an earphone w/o mic works also quite well even when puttting your tab at a distance.

Earphone jack faces some problem while detecting the earphone.

Storage is good for apps only and general reding stuff along with photos and songs storage is not a matter of concern.
Both sims are of nano type,

Though slippery little bit, but not a fingerprint magnet.
I have purchased a fast way book cover black in colur, it gives this tab a note diary look and preserves its rich appearance with safety.

you will not get better than this in need this range , the quality of camera, display and speaker are satisfying.... but you need to increase the RAM ... overall best tab from one of the best companies

Very good product...excellent battery backup,no lag at all,premium and stylish looks,approx 8 gb space left after os,the only thing i found not upto the mark was its display which wasn't as vibrant and rich as a superamoled screen-lenovo should definitely have to work upon it for meeting the premium screen qualities.....anyways quite happy with it other than its screen!

nice tablet from lenovo.
compared with lenovo yoga, this looks more like a phone because, the length is more and width is small which is not the case of lenovo yoga 8 inch tablet.

Pros:
1. good battery backup. with minimum usage, 100% lasts upto three complete days with network on and data, gps on. with moderate usage, it lasts for upto 1.5 to 2 complete days. for heavy usage, it can hardly last upto or less than a day. everything depends on the amount of usage.
2. charges quickly within three hours or so.
3. very nice design build quality.
4. this doesn't require jio4g voice app to be installed. it has 4g volte capability. make sure to distinguish the usage of jio4g voice app. this is installed in those phone which doesn't have volte support
5. sound quality is good enough
6. fingerprint sensor works fine.

Cons:
1. lesser internal memory. you will have only around 10 to 11gb internal memory available.
2. camera not that good. of course we cannot demand a high quality camera from an 8inch tablet that too in this price range.
3. some times faced problem with headset as it doesn't get recognized. not a serious problem, though.
4. hybrid sim slot which restricts you in expanding the memory or adding a sim.

overall, a nice product from lenovo.
Very good product from Lenovo. Good screen quality with enough battery charge. Excellent device to watch movies and TV series.

After using 2 years, I am giving this review
It is really good product, and I am well satisfied with this product especially battery was good enough, it will long lost 2 days with out playing any games.

Honest Review After Using The Tablet for 2 months.
The look is premium. The tab is solid enough. you can play pubg without any lag. 3gb of ram is gud. Major prblm is STORAGE.. it's only 16 gb(out of which 7 gb is used by os).
But we have an option to merge external storage with internal. so the prblm is solved. I got 3 updates within 2 months and also an upgrade to Android pie 9.0. Also, i got update to volte feature. The tab handles the load well. Adapter provided for charging heats a lot while charging the device even in AC room. so i have to remove it for some time and charge again.
overall a gud buy.

After a lot research i opted to buy this tab, which is just fabulous. Not too high end nor too low, i think its perfect for medium user like me, with great battery backup, and also with a finger print scanner. Display is great too. With not too bad camera.

This product is awesome product developed by lenovo.
I am getting this product on time.
I am fully satisfied by this product.
It has a fingerprint sensor at the right side and work as very fast.

Cons : 1. Very slippery due to the glass back.2. Fingerprint magnet. 3. The UI has utilized 8gb already so only 7-8 gb for internal memory.
Pro: 1. Good sound quality due to dual speaker with Dolby Atmos 2. Very crisp and clear screen 3. Good battery backup.
Tab is good but need to improve storage,price is so high if it is 32 GB price is worthy otherwise not worthy in case of price range

Delivered on time. But regret to say that no proper packaging by supplier, so chances of damages.
Product is very good 1) very loud n clear sound 2) perfect HD display 3) size 8inch is good for all usage.
Could reduce the price with non-calling options & may remove finger print sensor as well.

Please note, there are two different models of Lenovo Tab 4 8 plus. This model has 3GB RAM and 16GB Internal storage. There is another model with 4GB RAM and 64GB internal storage which is Rs.21,999.00. That model is not available in flipkart and it is available in Amazon.
Pros:
1) Very good display
2) Superb Audion Experience especially in Landscape mode while watching full screen videos.
3) Extremely good build quality. Feels premium
4) Running Android 7.1.1 and received multiple updates in last few weeks.
5) Very good gaming performance. Very responsive.
6) USB Type C and Finger print sensor at this price range is awesome.
7) Support for 2 SIMs or SIM+SD Card.

Cons:
1) No accessories available from Lenovo in India (Folio case, Bumper Case, Pen etc)
2) 4GB model is the best option but priced much higher compared to the 3GB model ( Costs a lot more just for the additional RAM and Storage, No other changes compared to the 3GB model)

I'm using it for the last few weeks and happy about its performance. I strongly recommend it. (If your budget allows, buy the 4GB model)

Beautiful product, stunning display. Adequate performance and light. Fits well into the palm of ones hand . Haven't tried using it for the heavier gaming apps but it's a neat buy if you are looking for a tab that's less than 10 inches .

software sucks..getting stuck using factory installed apps

Fast and responsive tab. Perfect for watching movies & YouTube, and for reading books.

I'm loving PDF reading on this tab. Screen quality is nice. High resolution screen is vibrant looking.

Listening to music is a joy, both with headphones and without - the speakers are front firing, reasonably loud and accurate sounding.

I don't play games so can't comment on that part. But for my use, snapdragon 625 with 3GB is snappy enough.

I'll highly recommend it.

Using this tab from 2 months, awesome experience. Display is very good, light weight. Dolby Atmos sound is great and it makes watching videos an amazing experience. Just go for it blindly. Fingerprint sensor is not so fast, rest everything is good.

one issue with earphone pluging.
When i plug earphone for the first time it works well and notify earphone plugged in,and then when i remove and pluged in again, then it does not work well..
We here sounds from tab as well as in headphone..and there is no notification about earphone pluged in. :(
Tab is updated to latest version

Pls help

This is the best tablet in this price range.
Display is gr8, colours are good and it is extremely sharp with adequate brightness.
Performance is fantastic thanks to SD625 and 3GB RAM is also sufficient.
Speakers are fantastic!! They are dual front firing speakers with gr8 sound quality and loudness.
The build quality is gr8. The glass back feels gr8 and its not very much of a fingerprint magnet, it does a good job of preventing fingerprints.
The cameras are average, as expected from any tablet. The fingerprint sensor works well. The multi user functionality is quick and gets the job done.
Battery life is also good enough. Not as good as the iPads but still better than most of the tablets in this price bracket thanks to the SD625.
Already received 3 updates within a couple of days. Maybe Lenovo can keep it up.
There is no voice calling but u can make calls through the jio app. There is a hybrid Sim slot.
Cons-
Battery backup could have been better.

I am satisfied with the service and look forward to deal again.

The Tablet looks very premium due to the glass back. Screen looks amazing and it is adequately bright. It's also smooth thanks to the SD 625. I would like to mention that Flipkart says Android 7.0 in the specs but the tab ships in with Android 7.1.1 out of the box. Also there is no headphone issue whatsoever that some people have written about.

Pros:
+Large display
+Thin and light
+Smooth and fast
+No bloatware( I found all the preinstalled apps useful)
+ Good looking interface and notification panel.
+ Fingerprint security

Cons:
-Accidental touches on the fingerprint sensor is quite frequent due to its positioning. (Power button is fingerprint sensor)
-Although tab has Dolby Atmos dual speakers I did not find the sound noteworthy. It is just okaykish.
-Battery life could be better but this is understandable because they made the tablet very thin and light.
-No fast charge support, also the charger that comes in the box is kind of cheap.
-This particular model has only 16 gigs of internal storage. Much of it is already consumed by the system.



The above mentioned shortcomings do not really bother me much. This is a great tablet that provides a wonderful android experience. Recommended.

Lenovo Tab 4 8 Plus --
Pros : prime series tab with good sound amalgamated with Dolby quality ( equilizers with app). USB- C type connectors --> 10 to 90% charging takes ~ 2 hrs. Picture quality is crystal with FHD display. It houses multi user accounts , each with separate fingerprint smart unlocking. Independent account with separate app lists & preferences. Camera is decent, good enough for VC. Hybrid slots for SIMs ( 2 nano) or mSD card. Dial band WiFi.

Cons : Doesnt support 4G LTE voice calling ( for Jio use 4GVC app). Youtube doesnt go to full screen on landscape mode, needs manual touch for full screen. Backside of the tab is also glass, so needs special care with tab cover. FM works only with headset cable & in nnon airplane mode.

Overall : Extremely smooth UI with Android 7.1. No clutter apps. Screenshot button is a good aaddition. Battery too runs for good amount of ttime. Light weight & responsive tab for personal & family use. !!

Device looks nice.
It has 4G dual SIM options with phone dialing features. It has finger print sensor in power button and that makes it easier to use.
It can also take Sdcard.

Cons:
========
The display is too boring and dull. It is dull and muted compared to even old Nexus 7 2013 edition with same resolution screen and same price point. They have used lower grade LCD panels to save money.

Other problem is the weak processor. Cortex A53 is too weak to handle anything demanding. These are used in better processor as low power CPU cores to conserve energy. Here they just bumped up the GHz to make up for it, but sadly it doesn't work. The execution unit is too weak to handle workload as they are more of low power optimised core by design.

Same goes for the GPU, it's too weak to handle Games at full HD.
